data.title: Turning All Directions
data.text:
1. Command: Right Turning(From Inline)
Description: Squad, Move to the right in 3's, Right Turn

2. Command: Right Turning(from In3s)
Description: Squad, will advance into line, Right Turn

3. Command: Left Turning(From Inline)
Description: Squad, Move to the left in 3's, Left Turn

4. Command: Left Turning(From In3s)
Description: Squad, will advance into line, Left Turn

5. Command: About Turn(From Inline)
Description: Squad, will advance into line, About Turn

6. Command: About Turn(From In3s)
Description: Squad, About Turn

data.title: Changing Formation From InLine
data.text:
1. Squad, by the right, change direction right, right form
2. Squad, by the left, change direction left, left form

data.title: Changing Formation From InLine at the Halt
data.text:
1. Squad, by the right, at the halt, change direction right, right form. Quick March.
2. Squad, by the left, at the halt, change direction left, left form. Quick March.

data.title: Changing Formation From In3s
data.text:
1. Squad, threes by the right, on the right, form squad.
2. Squad, threes by the left, on the left, form squad.

data.title: Changing Formation From In3s at the Halt
data.text:
1. Squad, threes by the right, at the Halt, on the right, form squad. Quick March.
2. Squad, threes by the left, at the Halt, on the left, form squad. Quick March.

data.title: Squad Reform in Single Line
data.text:
1. Squad Reform from InLine
2. Squad, by the right, advance in single file from the right, quick march
3. Squad Reform from In3s
4. Squad, threes by the left, advance in single file from the left, quick march
